functions.name: hex
functions.descr: convert a number to hex, or a string to a series of hex bytes

functions.name: typeOf
functions.descr: Return a string classifying the data type of x

functions.name: sizeOf
functions.descr: Count the bytes needed to store x internally

functions.name: keys
functions.descr: Return the member names of an object, as an array of strings

functions.name: join
functions.descr: Combine an array of strings into a single string

functions.name: orderBy
functions.descr: Sort a table (array of objects) via array of field names

functions.name: groupBy
functions.descr: Group elements of an array via an array of field names
